Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<<> AzureBlade stepped outside the cave and into the forest. The sun was 
> high in the sky, and a few clouds were crawling westwards. He 
> stretched his wings, made of metal. He then turned to Mistra, and, 
> even though she must have looked grotesque to another bot, she seemed 
> beautiful to him. He had never felt that way. After the atrocities he 
> had commited at the capture of his brother and the slaughter of the 
> two Decepticons, this feeling was a bliss. He was feeling peaceful 
> just looking at her.
> 
> AzureBlade: I know you will be able! If you need help however, I'm 
> sure I'll be able to carry you to the city!>>

Mistra stepped out into the sunlight, enjoying the bright sunlight. A bit 
odd, considering her beast form was partially a creature who preferred the 
dark. Then again, she wasn't truely a bat, was she? With a stretch of her 
own, she unfolded her own wings and smiled again at Azure. Hopefully he 
didn't mind her company much...especially since she liked having him around 
when it came down to it. And he was the only one she knew or trusted by now.

"Thank you Azure..." she said softly, smiling still.

<<OOC: Can you give me your address so I can send it back?>>

OOC: ^_^ Sure! I'm HanaKirei85@... ^_^. Hehe!

--part1_137.9528432.299b23af_boundary
